      public org.json.JSONObject Root​(java.lang.String ModelName) throws org.json.JSONException
      Stores the specified ModelObject - typically a dumb header node as its root
      Parameters:
      ModelName - Root node to be held by DBNode
      Throws:
      org.json.JSONException - Root not found

    • GetRoot

    • CreateDBNode

      public static DBNode CreateDBNode​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String path) throws java.io.IOException
      Creates a DBNode based on the Name and Path of the node specified. Path should be visibile to the JVM via typically the resources directory.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the DBNOde
      path - Path for storage
      Returns:
      instantiated node
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - File I/O Errors thrown to caller

    • DeleteModel

      public void DeleteModel​(xyz.model.ModelObject m)
      Deletes a ModelObject from the DBNode root graph
      Parameters:
      m - ModelObject to be removed

    • DeleteModel

      public void DeleteModel​(java.lang.String Class, java.lang.String UID)
      Deletes a model from this DBNode root Graph. Problematic if model is deeply stored this is not a DFS search but assumes a flat search directory. Models internal to other model objects won't be removed
      Parameters:
      Class - Class of Model to be removed
      UID - UID of Model to be removed

    • GetFile

      public java.lang.String GetFile()
      Gets the DBNode filename
      Returns:
      filename of DBNode (Model.keys)

    • WriteNode

      public void WriteNode​(java.lang.String url) throws java.io.IOException
      Writes a DBNode to the FileSystem
      Parameters:
      url - URL of the Path to Be Written To
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - File/IO Exception thrown to caller
